intro: Every second a choice. Every choice a consequence.
description:
Step into the shadows and build an empire from nothing. In this underground simulator, power is earned through ambition, strategy, and risk. Start small, grow smart. Cultivate rare plants, perfect your product, and balance quality, speed, and secrecy. Find market suppliers, target high-paying buyers, and stay ahead of rivals. Demand is high—if you can deliver. Reinvest profits to upgrade gear, automate production, and expand into new, riskier ventures. Control supply, dominate demand. Run a tight operation. Earn client trust, manage your crew, and make deals that change everything—fast.

Key Features:
– Grow and refine unique high-value crops.
– Manage production, upgrades, and staff to optimize output
– Discover hidden markets and build a loyal client base
– Make tough choices with lasting consequences
– Expand your plants empire and become the kingpin of your industry.

In this world, only the clever, cautious, and bold survive. Will you play it safe—or take the risks that lead to power?
Your empire won’t build itself.
